summary.description: Short summary of whether docs were updated and why.

edits.description: Documentation updates that can be applied automatically.

path.description: Relative path to the documentation file being edited.

patch.description: Unified diff patch (--- a/path +++ b/path ...) that applies to the target file.

justification.description: 1-3 sentence explanation of why the change is needed.

follow_ups.description: Optional backlog items for docs that cannot be updated automatically.

owner_hint.description: Optional pointer to the best owner or area.
